column2: And when he did, he followed this bizarre pattern that he has followed for year after year after year where he refuses to say the words radical Islamic terrorism.
column4: Says President Barack Obama "will not utter the words radical Islamic terrorism and as matter of policy, nobody in the administration will say the words radical Islamic terrorism."

column2: Lets be clear, how many hours of free media do CNN, and FOX, and every other station  you let him call in, and for a year  $2 billion dollars of free media
column4: Says Donald"Trump got, you know, $1.8 billion worth of free media. I got, like, none."
